nodes.text: Tahji Panagakos was an orphan living in Cjaalysce'I on the planet Socorro. Arriving on the planet after stowing away on a freighter, Panagakos made a living as a con artist and messenger for Cjaalysce'I's businesses. The city's engineers and technicians "adopted" Panagakos, making sure she always had clothes, food and shelter.
